text: Auntie Deirdre and Beth are discussing a plan for Beth's mother's 40th birthday celebration. Beth expresses interest in trying out a new job in the salon, and Deirdre offers to give her some work experience and pay her for it. Beth agrees, and they discuss the possibility of a tutor for Beth to help her with her foundation papers. Deirdre offers to give Beth some money to start off with and to take it from there.
